body.p: Oracc II is an update of Oracc with several goals:

ul.li: Re-implement core Oracc components that are presently written in Perl in C
Improve processing capacity and performance for large projects such as ePSD
Improve support for sign lists, both the system-wide sign lists and corpus-based sign lists

body.p: These pages provide notes about the implementation and features of Oracc II. They are primarily intended for advanced users and programmers who are working with the Oracc UI or Oracc data.
